articles.original_title: Coinbase and Citi Team Up To Fix Crypto's Biggest Roadblock For Institutional Money—Here's Why That Matters
articles.original_body: The gap between traditional finance and digital assets just got narrower. Coinbase Global Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) and Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) announced a collaboration last week aimed at making it easier for large institutions to move money using ...
